page.title: 16Burgess's
page.content: {Burgess's}or Farm Industries is a machinery store that sells{ {tractors, bailers, combine harvesters} and other farm machines. Most of these are outside. The building itself is made of prefabricated sections with a wall of glass along the front. As you enter you see their one farm computer set up, and mowing machines, including ride-on-models. Further in there are {shovels, scrapers, hammers, dog foods, {spirits and paints, fertilizers and {chemicals}used at farms, such as in a sheep dip. They sell and also repair equipment for cutting down trees and rough grass including{chain saws}and{ {power scythes.}Down the other side there are gate hangings,{hooks, {bolts, screws and nails.}In another corner of the building are{coats, {tractor suits and body warmers and {also strong farm boots.}
